entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
